title: The Math Behind the LFD NFT - The After Show
itunes:title: The Math Behind the LFD NFT - The After Show
description:
La Flor Dominicana recently sold 7 NFTs. These allows you to purchase the Golden Bull. These sold for a lot of money – about $90,000. Most were purchased by retailers. Is there any way they can recoup their initial investment.

The Cigar Authority is a member of the United Podcast Network and is recorded live in front of a studio audience at Studio 21 Podcast Cafe upstairs at Two Guys Smoke Shop in Salem, NH and as always you can find many of the cigars we discuss at https://www.2GuysCigars.com/.
